title: For my true love
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/HIV (Viruses)

abstract: 'After waiting for two hours, I was starting to worry.'
description: When Russell and Wendy were both diagnosed with HIV they resolved to lean on each other as they feared discrimination. Eventually they reached out to organisations like Straight Arrows and started to feel alive again.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002218; Journeys into the unknown : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2008
